00134             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00135             {
00136                   try
00137                   {
00138                         $Parameters = '';
00139                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'static_content' ) ; )
00140                         {
00141                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00142                               $StaticContent = $this->StaticContentAccess->get_content_ex( $this->BlockSettings );
00143                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( 
00144                                     "{static_content:$Parameters}" , $StaticContent , $ProcessingString
00145                               );
00146                               $Changed = true;
00147                         }
00148                         
00149                         return( $ProcessingString );
00150                   }
00151                   catch( Exception $e )
00152                   {
00153                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00154                   }
